summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Tuesday 7 December to end of Tuesday 7 December GMT
description: Windy on Tuesday as Storm Barra affects UK weather. Heavy rain also at times.<br/><br/>Wind expected to be strongest in the afternoon and throughout the day an Atlantic airflow will ensure good dispersion.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
